avatar.$desc: Get the avatar of a member.

member.$desc: The member to get the avatar of.

banner.$desc: Get the banner of a member.

member.$desc: The member to get the banner of.

color.$desc: Converts a color into many forms.
The color to convert. Accepts hex colors, rgb, hsl, hsv, cmyk, or named. Omit to get a random color.

ping.$desc: Check if the bot is still alive or not.

server.$desc: Server configuration commands for temporary voice channels.

setup.$desc: Setup a temporary voice channel creator.

add.$desc: Add a voice channel to be a temporary voice channel creator.

channel.$desc: The channel to be a temporary voice channel creator.

category.$desc: The category temporary voice channel should be created in.

remove.$desc: Remove a voice channel from being a temporary voice channel creator.

channel.$desc: The channel to remove from being a temporary voice channel creator.

info.$desc: Get currently configured temporary voice channel creators.

channel.$desc: Show the specific temporary voice channel creator configuration.

name.$desc: Change the name of the template temporary voice channel.

limit.$desc: Change the user limit of the template temporary voice channel.

bitrate.$desc: Change the bitrate of the template temporary voice channel.

region.$desc: Change the region of the template temporary voice channel.

default.$desc: Make this setting only affects the specified channel creator.

name.$desc: Change the name of a temporary voice channel you owned.
The new name of the temporary voice channel.

limit.$desc: Change the user limit of a temporary voice channel you owned.
The new user limit of the temporary voice channel. (0 = Unlimited)

bitrate.$desc: Change the bitrate of a temporary voice channel you owned.
The new bitrate of the temporary voice channel. (In kbps)

region.$desc: Change the region of a temporary voice channel you owned.
The new region of the temporary voice channel.

default.$desc: Make this name as the server default name of the temporary voice channel on channel creation.

global.$desc: Save the setting globally so it applies to all servers.
